content.question: A thin rectangular sheet of metal expands in a hot oven. At the instant when the width of the rectangular sheet of metal is <math alttext="200" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>200</mn></math> millimeters and the length is <math alttext="300" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>300</mn></math> millimeters, the width is increasing at a rate of <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> millimeters per minute and the length is increasing at a rate of <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> millimeters per minute. What is the rate of change of the area, in square millimeters per minute, of the rectangular sheet of metal at that instant?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
